messages.title: My Priorities for Maldon Constituency
messages.content:
DELIVER BREXIT BY BACKING BORIS' DEAL
I campaigned for Britain to leave the EU and believe that we must deliver on the Referendum result. I support Boris' deal which will end uncertainty and allow us to reach new trade agreements with the EU and around the world.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: DELIVER BREXIT BY BACKING BORIS' DEAL
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support Boris Johnson's Brexit deal to end uncertainty and commence new trade agreements globally.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: SUPPORT BUSINESS AND INVEST IN PUBLIC SERVICES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strengthen the economy and invest in local Police, Schools, and the NHS. Increase Essex police numbers, and support the development of Maldon Health Hub and new Medical Centres in Heybridge and Woodham Ferrers.
Invest in infrastructure, such as new trains and station at Beaulieu, and improve the A12. Continue to protect our countryside.

issues.brexitEurope: DELIVER BREXIT BY BACKING BORIS' DEAL - Campaign for Britain to leave the EU and support Boris' deal.
issues.economy: SUPPORT BUSINESS AND INVEST IN PUBLIC SERVICES - Strengthen the economy through local Police, Schools, and NHS investments.
issues.health: SUPPORT BUSINESS AND INVEST IN PUBLIC SERVICES - Plans for Maldon Health Hub and new Medical Centres in Heybridge and Woodham Ferrers.

housing.content: INFRASTRUCTURE TO SUPPORT NEW HOUSING - Invest in infrastructure to support new housing, ensure more is spent on new trains, station at Beaulieu, and improvement of the A12. Continue to protect countryside.

quotes.text: ONLY A MAJORITY GOVERNMENT CAN GET ON WITH THE COUNTRY'S PRIORITIES
